long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Description:
Get ready to experience the adrenaline-pumping world of "Extreme Japan Drift Game"! Immerse yourself in the heart of Japan's vibrant street racing culture and become a legendary drift king in this high-octane game.

ğŸš— Choose Your Dream Ride: Select from a wide range of meticulously detailed, iconic Japanese, european and american sports cars, including legendary classics and modern marvels. Customize your vehicle with a vast array of performance upgrades, paint jobs, and decals to make it uniquely yours.

ğŸ Take on the Toughest Tracks: Race through stunning, real-world-inspired locations across Japan. From neon-lit urban streets to winding mountain passes, each track offers a unique challenge that will test your drifting skills to the limit.

ğŸŒŸ Master the Art of Drifting: Perfect your drifting technique as you slide around corners at breakneck speeds. Feel the rush as you initiate a perfect drift, leaving a trail of smoke and impressing the crowd. The more stylish and precise your drifts, the more points and rewards you'll earn.

ğŸ† Compete in Intense Races: Go head-to-head against skilled AI opponents or challenge friends in thrilling multiplayer races. Prove your supremacy in a variety of race modes, including Time Trials, Drift Battles, and Championship Races.

ğŸ’¥ Unlock and Upgrade: Earn rewards for your skills and dedication, allowing you to unlock new cars, upgrade your existing ones, and enhance your drifting abilities. Dominate the leaderboards and become the ultimate drift champion.

ğŸŒ† Explore the Japanese Car Culture: Immerse yourself in the rich culture of Japanese street racing. Discover hidden garages, meet fellow racers, and uncover the secrets of the underground racing scene.

ğŸ¶ Epic Soundtrack: Feel the rush of the race with a dynamic soundtrack that perfectly complements the high-speed action. Customize your racing experience by choosing your favorite tunes to accompany your adventures.

ğŸ“¸ Capture the Moment: Share your most epic drifts and race victories with the world. Take stunning in-game photos and videos to showcase your skills and brag about your achievements on social media.

"Extreme Japan Drift Car Racing" offers an authentic and exhilarating drift racing experience like no other. Strap in, rev your engines, and prepare for a journey through the heart of Japan's underground racing scene. Are you ready to become the ultimate drift king? Download now and start your journey to glory!

HOW TO PLAY
You can move the car with the arrow keys, space and W-A-S-D keys. You can use nitro with the shift key.

HOW TO INSTALL
Click download this Extension using the "Add to Chrome" button.

Once the game has finished loading, simply select the "Extensions Icon" button. 

After clicking this, you'll be directed to the playground area, where the game "Extreme Japan Drift Game" will launch automatically. All that's left is to press the play button and start enjoying the game.
